short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EZ Utilities - All-in-One Chrome Extension for daily tasks: color picking, to-do lists, password generation, and games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offers features such as a Color Picker for selecting and applying colors on any webpage, a Text Utility for text formatting, a Password Generator, a To-Do List manager, and interactive game like Rock Paper Scissors. The extension also includes "WeatherWise," providing real-time weather updates using the OpenWeatherAPI.
